title: Breakingviews TV: Death toll
text:
Breakingviews TV: Death toll 4:55pm GMT - 04:29 
After a pedestrian fatality involving an Uber driverless car, Antony Currie and Robert Cyran explain how the pharma industry offers a lesson in how to balance legal redress and societal benefits from new tech: ban lawsuits and have industry finance a compensation fund. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
